how.header: From consultation to finish, we care for every detail—clean techniques, calm pacing, and results that last.
how.consultationDesc: We start by understanding your goals and preferences—finish, shape, sensitivity, and routine—so the service can be tailored to you.
how.cleanPrepDesc: Meticulous cuticle care and shaping form the foundation. Clean techniques support nail health and set up a flawless finish.
how.techniqueDesc: Precise application and even coverage—whether sheer, bold, or art—with attention to symmetry and smooth, lasting wear.
how.finishDesc: Choose from glossy or soft-matte. We share simple, effective aftercare to keep your finish looking fresh between visits.
